entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:28 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 3:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
